data.message: Hi after the latest update, i cant find the option to rotate photo in the comment. Please let me know how to rotate photos

replies.message: Hi Supat. Are you trying to rotate photos on desktop or on mobile? -Anna
Thanks for the follow up, Supat! You can learn how to rotate a photo from your mobile browser here: http://bit.ly/2yFl60e. Have a great day! -Caitlin
